cleanmac.hero_subtitle: Keep your Mac clean, fast, and optimized
cleanmac.hero_description: A powerful tool to clean system caches, browser data, temporary files, and more. Works seamlessly with our Chrome extension.
cleanmac.hero_badge_rating_sub: Real feedback from the open-source community
cleanmac.features_subtitle: Comprehensive system cleanup in one click
cleanmac.feature_system_desc: Remove temporary system files and application caches
cleanmac.feature_browser_desc: Clear cache from Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge
cleanmac.feature_temp_desc: Delete temporary files that are no longer needed
cleanmac.feature_logs_desc: Remove old log files that take up disk space
cleanmac.feature_dev_desc: Clean Xcode, npm, Yarn, CocoaPods caches
cleanmac.feature_trash_desc: Empty your Trash with one click
cleanmac.feature_schedule_desc: Schedule automatic cleanups to keep your Mac running smoothly
cleanmac.screenshots_subtitle: See CleanMac App and Chrome extension in action
cleanmac.pricing_payment_setup_error: Payment system is being set up. Please try again later or download directly from GitHub.
cleanmac.download_note: Drag the app to Applications folder to install
cleanmac.extension_subtitle: Clean your browser cache with one click
cleanmac.extension_desc: Our Chrome extension lets you clear your browser cache instantly without leaving your current page.
cleanmac.comparisons_subtitle: Compare against other popular tools and see where we win.
cleanmac.comparisons_choice_title: Built for people who want fast, transparent cleaning without ads.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit1_desc: Full cleanup without pop-ups or aggressive upsell.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit2_desc: Full transparency for users who care about security and privacy.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit3_desc: No subscriptions or tricks; lifetime access to the macOS app.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit4_desc: Clean browser and macOS with the same brand experience.
cleanmac.comp_onyx_desc: Powerful but aimed at advanced users. CleanMac brings a modern UI with safe presets.
cleanmac.comp_ccleaner_desc: Free tier is limited with heavy upsell. CleanMac has no ads and charges once.
cleanmac.comp_appcleaner_desc: Removes apps but not system caches or junk. CleanMac does a full cleanup.
cleanmac.comp_buhocleaner_desc: Paid and closed-source. CleanMac is Software with an accessible one-time price.
cleanmac.comp_daisydisk_desc: Great for visualizing space, not for automatic cleanup. CleanMac cleans in one click.
cleanmac.comp_mackeeper_desc: Heavy and controversial suite. CleanMac is lightweight, transparent, and bloat-free.
cleanmac.comp_iboysoft_desc: Paid disk manager. CleanMac focuses on fast, lightweight cleanup.
cleanmac.comp_avast_desc: Recurring billing and telemetry. CleanMac doesn't track and has no subscriptions.
cleanmac.faq_q1: Is CleanMac App safe to use?
cleanmac.faq_a1: Yes, CleanMac App only removes temporary files and caches that are safe to delete. Your personal files are never touched.
cleanmac.faq_q2: Does it work on Apple Silicon Macs?
cleanmac.faq_a2: Yes, CleanMac App works on both Intel and Apple Silicon (M1, M2, M3) Macs.
cleanmac.faq_a3: No, it's a one-time payment for lifetime access. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.
cleanmac.faq_a4: No, all payments are final and we do not offer refunds. Please make sure CleanMac App meets your needs before purchasing.
cleanmac.footer_desc: Free,  Mac cleanup tool. Keep your Mac running smoothly.
cleanmac.download_page_subtitle_success: Payment confirmed. Download the appropriate version for your Mac.
cleanmac.download_page_subtitle_error: We need the session_id to unlock the download.
cleanmac.download_page_apple_silicon_desc: Recommended for Macs with Apple Silicon chips.
cleanmac.download_page_password_note: The downloaded file is password protected. Use the password: cleanmac2025
cleanmac.download_page_error_session_not_found: Session ID not found in URL
cleanmac.download_page_error_payment_not_confirme: Payment not confirmed. Please check the payment status.
cleanmac.download_page_error_server_connection: Error connecting to server. Please try again.
cleanmac.privacy_section1_content: CleanMac App ("we", "our" or "app") respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our macOS application.
cleanmac.privacy_section2_content: CleanMac App is designed with privacy in mind. We collect minimal information:
cleanmac.privacy_section2_item1: No personal data is collected automatically
cleanmac.privacy_section2_item3: No information is sent to external servers
cleanmac.privacy_section3_content: Since we do not collect personal data, there is no information to use or share. All processing is done locally on your Mac.
cleanmac.privacy_section4_content: CleanMac App operates completely offline. All cleanup operations are performed locally on your device, ensuring maximum security and privacy.
cleanmac.privacy_section5_content: CleanMac App does not use cookies, beacons, or other tracking technologies.
cleanmac.privacy_section6_content: Since we do not collect personal data, there is no data to access, modify, or delete. You have complete control over the use of the application.
cleanmac.privacy_section7_content: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. We recommend reviewing this page periodically to be aware of any changes.
cleanmac.privacy_contact_content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our website: https://developmentsemicolon.github.io/
cleanmac.terms_section1_content: By downloading, installing, or using CleanMac App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, you should not use the application.
cleanmac.terms_section2_content: CleanMac App is a cleaning and optimization tool for macOS that allows you to clean caches, temporary files, logs, and other system data. The application operates locally on your device.
cleanmac.terms_section3_content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use CleanMac App on your personal macOS devices. This license is for personal and non-commercial use.
cleanmac.terms_section4_content: CleanMac App offers a free version (Chrome extension) and a Pro version (macOS app) available for a one-time payment. All payments are processed through third-party services (Stripe). All payments are final and we do not offer refunds.
cleanmac.terms_section5_content: CleanMac App is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the application.
cleanmac.terms_section6_content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of CleanMac App at any time, with or without prior notice.
cleanmac.terms_section7_content: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Brazil. Any dispute related to these terms will be resolved in the competent courts of Brazil.
cleanmac.terms_contact_content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our website: https://developmentsemicolon.github.io/
cleanmac.page_title: CleanMac App | Clean cache and optimize macOS
cleanmac.page_description: CleanMac App is a fast and transparent alternative: clean caches, logs, temporary files and browser in 1 click. No ads, no tracking and with a one-time payment.
cleanmac.page_keywords: clean my mac, cleanmymac alternative, clean cache, clean logs, clean temporary files, clean browser, clean storage, clean macbook, clean browser mac
